modShortDescription: This mod adds some different vehicle upgrades to the game. Aero Dynamics Upgrade, Fuel Saver Upgrade, Headlights Upgrade and Turbo Upgrade.
modDescription:
This mod adds some different [vehicle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) upgrades to the game. All upgrades can only be looted.

## Features

* **Aero Dynamics Upgrade:** Improves speed through Aero Dynamics.
* **Fuel Saver Upgrade:** Use 50% less fuel on your journeys.
* **Headlights Upgrade:** Brighten up the map with this ultra cool light addon.
* **Turbo Upgrade:** Speed Speed Speed!

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/War3zuk/War3zuk-7DTD-Stable-ModLets-2020/tree/master/War3zuk%20Vehicle%20Addons)**
